Fast API

01.
FastAPI - A python framework | Full Course
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7t2alSnE2-I

02a.
FastAPI - Debugging
https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/tutorial/debugging
if __name__ == "__main__":
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)

02b.
FastAPI - Reload
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/75625178/uvicorn-with-reload-true-not-running-against-database-in-fastapi-app
if __name__ == "__main__":
    import uvicorn
    uvicorn.run('myprogram:app', host="0.0.0.0", port=8000, log_level="debug", reload=True,)
